description:
Ideas, Visions and Reality: Looking back on 20 years of community work -
PyCon Italia 2022

Python has become very important for many of us - as the basis for
making a living, as a way to enjoy programming, or to bring people
together.

I’d like to take you on a tour through my two decades of community work
and hopefully inspire some of you to contribute to the community as
well. Python has become a very important part of life for many of us -
as the basis for making a living, as a way to enjoy programming, or as a
project which brings together people. I’ve had the opportunity to work
in all these fields in the last two decades and have learned a lot.

In this talk I’d like to take you on a tour, share some of the insights
I have gained and hopefully inspire some of you to contribute to the
community as well.

PDF of the talk slides:

Speaker: Marc-André Lemburg
title: Ideas, Visions and Reality: Looking back on 20 years of community work - Mar
